title: 3 and Out - MNF Doubleheader Reaction, 2X Tuesday Preview, Analytics Insanity, Rodgers MVP, Urban's Excuses, Headlines
itunes:title: 3 and Out - MNF Doubleheader Reaction, 2X Tuesday Preview, Analytics Insanity, Rodgers MVP, Urban's Excuses, Headlines
description:
John reacts to the two Monday Night Football games, including the Raiders going into Cleveland to get a win over the Browns, and the Vikings beating the Bears on the road. He also looks ahead to the Tuesday games between the WFT/Eagles, Rams/Seahawks, and gives some quick takes on the biggest headlines heading into week 16, including why the NFL's analytics trend has gotten out of hand, and the case for Aaron Rodgers to win MVP. He also answers listener questions in Middlekauff Mailbag. Make sure you follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
